entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then a few flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
